headline: As redistricting drags on, Ohio Republicans get serious about 2022's 'flip-able' districts
author: Anna Staver
sentences: During her time in the Senate, Maharath has sponsored bills to ban landlords from putting mandatory cable fees in leases, increase access to diapers for families in need and banning conversion therapy for minors.

Senate District 3, which currently includes New Albany, Gahanna, Reynoldsburg and parts of Columbus, was held by Republicans until 2018 when Maharath won in an upset that even surprised members of her own party.
